title: Form Applications
description: Used when any application process is started, such as financing, limit changes, or educational programs.

formApplicationApproved.title: Form Application Approved
formApplicationApproved.description: Captured when a visitor application has been approved.

formApplicationDeclined.title: Form Application Declined
formApplicationDeclined.description: Captured when a visitor application has been declined.

formApplicationID.title: Form Application ID
formApplicationID.description: Identifier used during an application process.

formApplicationRequestedAmount.title: Form Application Requested Amount
formApplicationRequestedAmount.description: Tracks the monetary value of the application.

formApplicationStatus.title: Form Application Status
formApplicationStatus.description: Captures the status of the application for any given point in the application process.

formApplicationStatusUpdate.title: Form Application Status Update
formApplicationStatusUpdate.description: Captured when the status for an application changes, either from an online or offline update.

formApplicationUnderReview.title: Form Application Under Review
formApplicationUnderReview.description: Captured when a visitor application has been placed under review.
